column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=We had just come home from the beach one Saturday afternoon .
#text=We had a great time , but were very sweaty , sandy and sticky with old sunscreen , sweat and salt from the ocean .
#text=After unpacking the car , I had to take a bath .
#text=I put in the drain plug and started running the water , making sure the temperature of the water was just right , and put in my favorite bath scents and soap .
#text=When the tub was full , I immersed myself deep into the tub and just let my body soak for a while .
#text=It was good to sit in the nice , warm water and let everything just relax and melt away from me .
#text=I washed my hair with my favorite shampoo , as I had a lot of sand in it from playing at the beach that day .
#text=I scrubbed my body well with a washcloth , to get off all the sand and ocean salt that had dried on my skin , along with the sunscreen that I had been using .
#text=It was very relaxing and I felt really good .
#text=I then pulled the drain on the tub and let all the dirty water go down .
#text=I had a big , fluffy bath towel that I dried off in , and I put on clean clothes .
#text=I was ready to finish up our fun day with some dinner and good times with my family .
